dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold risks and face challenges head-on, always seeking the next adrenaline rush.
Your FarTwin will approach uncertainty with caution, weighing risks and considering multiple outcomes before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Confidence Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin present themselves to others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively express their opinions and showcase their skills, commanding attention without apology.
Your FarTwin will maintain a low profile, speaking only when necessary and preferring to listen rather than speak.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on gut instincts and instincts to make decisions, trusting their inner voice without overthinking.
Your FarTwin will methodically evaluate options, weighing pros and cons before making a rational decision based on data and logic.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and authentically express their feelings, wearing their heart on their sleeve.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with those they trust or when necessary.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will effortlessly charm and connect with people from all walks of life, forging strong bonds and networks.
Your FarTwin will prefer to interact with a smaller circle of close friends or acquaintances, valuing depth over breadth in their relationships.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin respond to change?

options.description: Your FarTwin will quickly adjust to new situations, embracing challenges as opportunities for growth and learning.
Your FarTwin will struggle with change, resisting or refusing to adapt to new circumstances or expectations.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative pursuits?

options.description: Your FarTwin will envision innovative solutions, pushing boundaries and exploring new frontiers in their creative endeavors.
Your FarTwin will focus on refining existing ideas, ensuring that their creative output is practical, functional, and meets real-world needs.

dimensions.label: Perseverance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle obstacles?

options.description: Your FarTwin will persistently push forward, driven by a strong work ethic and unwavering commitment to achieving their goals.
Your FarTwin will often become discouraged and disheartened by setbacks, potentially giving up or losing motivation when faced with obstacles.
